name: SpaceLoop (AlexKnyaz)
description:
You just fly home after a long journey and listened to the Russian hit "And we do not dream of the roar of the cosmodrome ..." But enything went wrong ... When you woke up, blood was oozing from your hand, and the buttons on the ship's control panel were blinking.

Controls:

WSAD - moving

E - Use items and open doors
